title: Quiz 4: Practical Exam - February 2022
description: Practical exam covering Patient Database design, Lookup Wizards, and HTML Web Design basics.

questions.question: Match the 'PATIENT TABLE' fields with their required Data Types:
questions.explanation: ID Number (Text), Telephone (Number), DOB (Date/time), NHIF (Yes/No) are defined in Question 2.
questions.hint: Check the Table Design instructions in Question 2.

questions.question: Which field property was specified for the 'Telephone number' field?
questions.explanation: Question 2 table specifies 'Long integer' for Telephone number field size.
questions.hint: It's a standard number format for whole numbers in Access.

questions.question: For Question 5, you are required to create a ___BLANK___ for the payment field to allow selection of NHIF, Cash, Credit, etc.
questions.explanation: Question 5: 'Create a lookup wizard for the payment field'.
questions.hint: This feature creates a drop-down list in Access.

questions.question: Arrange the order of fields after the modification requested in Question 7:
questions.explanation: Question 7 asks to 'Move the date of birth... so that the date of birth field is now directly after the surname field'.

questions.question: In the 'AGE QUERY' (Question 12), what year serves as the cutoff for patients to be displayed?
questions.explanation: Question 12: 'Create a query showing patients born after 1972'.
questions.hint: Look for the specific year mentioned in Question 12.

questions.question: The 'PAYMENT TABLE' should be created manually in Design View.
questions.explanation: Question 11 explicitly states: 'Create a new table called PAYMENT TABLE using the Query method'.
questions.hint: Read Question 11 carefully regarding the method of creation.

questions.question: For the Web Design section (Section 2), which of the following input fields are required in the HTML form? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: The Web Design task lists: Name, ID No, Location, Sub location, Telephone No.
questions.hint: Review the list of details in the Web Design section.

questions.question: What is the heading text required for the HTML webpage?
questions.explanation: The task shows 'KITUI COUNTY GOVERNMENT' as the main heading.
questions.hint: It is the name of the county.
